segments.text: I want to take Shield on a date but I don't have much money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does she like to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She likes to golf , dance , and eat foreign food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . Sounds like she has pretty pricey tastes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I really like being with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you thought about going Dutch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not where , what . Dutch means you both pay your own way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I wonder if she'll go for that .
segments.speaker: S1
